metadata.title: Why does VOICE-RA4E1 kit only have one digital microphone ?

sections.content:
Question:
Why does VOICE-RA4E1 kit only have one digital microphone ?
Answer:
VOICE-RA4E1 uses RA4E1 microcontroller in 48pin package which only has enough pins for a single digital microcontroller connection. In case you will need two digital microphone, please use VOICE-RA6E1.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
